infos.value: What in the name of...?
Hm. These Rundall soldiers certainly don't have the most luxurious barracks to sleep in.
They're not sleeping, you lackwit. Someone did this to them.
Hey⁠—what happened here?
You... You must be friends with that woman...
N-no, not exactly...
Urgh... Th-that woman... Who is she...?
Hey, that's my line. Tell me⁠—where did she go?
Gugh...
It seems that this was Luartha's doing.
What a curious turn of events.
Hm. This Luartha is turning out to be quite the feisty princess.
Someone's coming!
Y-you... You're in league with that woman!
Not in league with her, no. Though it's not entirely out of the question that she and I become family soon enough.
S-stop it. Don't make the situation more complicated.
But I'm simply speaking the truth.
Viktora...?
Dammit, she's disappeared.
Well, then...how do we deal with this development?
At this rate, we'll be putting Chel in danger.
That's no good. No, no good at all.
Chel is my treasure.
Yay, yay! Howlie is the best!
Well, aren't you a tight-knit little family.
We'll make sure you get to stay together in the afterlife, too.
Brother, let's scatter them and make a break for it.
There's no way around it. Let's do as you said.
